Text: Re george rustayThis is the name and number of the attorney we talked about and the name of the person referring you Jenn who works with me is Georges future daughterinlaw Hope this helps keep me posted buddy D Jennifer Garnett PM

Re george rustaydid it go today AM Good Morning Derek I just wanted to thank you for being such a good friend I really need someone to talk to and you were there for me I ll never forget that Anyway I will call Mr Rustay first thing this morning Thank you again for the number She did call me last night and I took the HIGH road like you said and everything you said was going to happen did She is not coming back here Ill let you know what Mr Rustay says about my situation Thanks again for everything You truly are a great friend Joe Step Derek Leon on PM To cc Subject Re george rustay Joe This is the name and number of the attorney we talked about and the name of the person referring you Jenn who works with me is Georges future daughterinlaw Hope this helps keep me posted buddy D Jennifer Garnett PM

Re HELLOJoe Im in North Carolina until Sunday if you need to reach me call my cell phone PM Hey Derek I need your help are you there today Original Message From Derek Leon ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESDerekLeonCdleonbracepattEcomE NRONcom Sent Monday June PM To Stepenovitch Joe Subject Summer Party Date Place Derek and Scotts pad Wood Street Time pm Bring anyone you like Food and adult beverages will be provided Map attached Hope to see you there RSVP Millersjpg File Millersjpg
